questions.translation: Is that your book?
My name is Anna.
Where is your car?
His dog is very friendly.
What is your brother's name?
Her parents live in Berlin.
That is my sister.
Where are your keys?
Our house is very big.
How old is your daughter?
Her friend comes from Spain.
We are looking for our teacher.
She loves her cat very much.
I forgot my homework.
He gives his girlfriend a present.
Can you park your bicycles here?

questions.example: Sie spricht mit ___ Mutter am Telefon.
questions.translation: She is speaking with her mother on the phone.
The teacher corrects your mistakes.
We sold our car.
He lost his keys.
Can I borrow your pen?
Do you have your mobile phone with you?
The children are doing their homework.
He helps his grandfather in the garden.
I don't understand your explanation.
She introduces her new colleagues.
We changed our plans.
He expressed his opinion clearly.
The family celebrates its anniversary.
I respect your decision.
We did not meet their expectations.
He kept his promise.
The company has doubled its turnover.
Do you have your documents with you?

questions.example: Er hat ___ Verhalten nicht erklären können.
questions.translation: He couldn't explain his behavior.
The students passed their exams.

questions.example: Der Autor stellt ___ neues Buch vor.
questions.translation: The author presents his new book.
The teachers evaluate their methods critically.
The politician changed his opinion.
The company presents its new strategy.
We need to reconsider our approach.
The experts expressed their concerns.
The candidate withdrew his application.
The professor publishes her research results.
The participants express their concerns openly.

questions.example: Der Konzern hat ___ Ziele nicht erreicht.
questions.translation: The corporation did not achieve its goals.
The employees have fulfilled their tasks.
The association has revised its statutes.
The customers have submitted their complaints.
The committee has presented its recommendations.
The organization has reformed its structures.
The parties have outlined their positions.
The artist presents his latest works.

questions.example: Die Regierung hat ___ Strategie grundlegend geändert.
questions.translation: The government has fundamentally changed its strategy.

questions.example: Die Kommission hat ___ Bericht vorgelegt, der heftig kritisiert wurde.
questions.translation: The commission presented its report, which was heavily criticized.

questions.example: Der Konzern muss ___ Einfluss auf die Politik rechtfertigen.
questions.translation: The corporation must justify its influence on politics.
The scientists have refuted their hypothesis.

questions.example: Der Vorstand hat ___ Verantwortung für den Skandal eingestanden.
questions.translation: The board has admitted its responsibility for the scandal.
The university has revised its admission procedures.

questions.example: Der Ausschuss hat ___ Entscheidung einstimmig getroffen.
questions.translation: The committee made its decision unanimously.

questions.example: Die Experten haben ___ Gutachten unabhängig voneinander erstellt.
questions.translation: The experts created their assessments independently of each other.

questions.example: Der Verband muss ___ Satzung den neuen Vorschriften anpassen.
questions.translation: The association must adapt its statutes to the new regulations.
The authority has exceeded its powers.
The parliament refused its approval.
The representatives resigned from their mandates.
The corporation has expanded its market position.
The foundation has revised its funding guidelines.

questions.example: Das Komitee hat ___ Vorbehalte deutlich zum Ausdruck gebracht.
questions.translation: The committee has clearly expressed its reservations.

questions.example: Die Regierung hat ___ Koalitionspartner vor vollendete Tatsachen gestellt.
questions.translation: The government presented its coalition partner with a fait accompli.
The board has exceeded its area of competence.

questions.example: Die internationalen Organisationen haben ___ Bedenken hinsichtlich der Menschenrechtslage zum Ausdruck gebracht.
questions.translation: The international organizations have expressed their concerns regarding the human rights situation.

questions.example: Der Verfassungsgerichtshof hat ___ Urteil mit einer detaillierten Begründung versehen.
questions.translation: The Constitutional Court provided its judgment with a detailed reasoning.

questions.example: Die Fraktionen haben ___ Abstimmungsverhalten taktisch angepasst.
questions.translation: The parliamentary groups have tactically adjusted their voting behavior.

questions.example: Der Aufsichtsrat hat ___ Bedenken bezüglich der Geschäftsstrategie nicht hinreichend artikuliert.
questions.translation: The supervisory board did not adequately articulate its concerns regarding the business strategy.

questions.example: Die Sachverständigen haben ___ Expertisen unabhängig voneinander erstellt, kamen jedoch zu ähnlichen Schlussfolgerungen.
questions.translation: The experts created their assessments independently of each other, but came to similar conclusions.

questions.example: Das Ministerium hat ___ Zuständigkeitsbereich erweitert, ohne die anderen Ressorts zu konsultieren.
questions.translation: The ministry expanded its area of responsibility without consulting the other departments.

questions.example: Die Diplomaten haben ___ Verhandlungsposition in multilateralen Gesprächen abgestimmt.
questions.translation: The diplomats coordinated their negotiating position in multilateral talks.

questions.example: Der Ethikrat hat ___ Empfehlung mit umfangreichen Erläuterungen versehen.
questions.translation: The Ethics Council provided its recommendation with extensive explanations.

questions.example: Die Prüfungskommission hat ___ Beurteilungskriterien transparent dargelegt.
questions.translation: The examination board has transparently set out its assessment criteria.

questions.example: Der Nobelpreisträger hat in ___ Dankesrede die gesellschaftliche Relevanz der Grundlagenforschung betont.
questions.translation: In his acceptance speech, the Nobel Prize winner emphasized the social relevance of basic research.

questions.example: Die Verfassungsrichter haben ___ Entscheidung einstimmig gefällt, was die Legitimität des Urteils stärkt.
questions.translation: The constitutional judges made their decision unanimously, which strengthens the legitimacy of the verdict.

questions.example: Der Ausschuss hat ___ Bericht trotz zahlreicher Kritikpunkte verabschiedet.
questions.translation: The committee adopted its report despite numerous points of criticism.

questions.example: Die Redner haben ___ Argumente sachlich und differenziert vorgetragen.
questions.translation: The speakers presented their arguments objectively and in a differentiated manner.

questions.example: Der Konzern hat ___ Expansionsstrategie an die geänderten Marktbedingungen angepasst.
questions.translation: The corporation has adapted its expansion strategy to the changed market conditions.

questions.example: Die Institution hat ___ Forschungsschwerpunkte interdisziplinär ausgerichtet.
questions.translation: The institution has oriented its research priorities in an interdisciplinary manner.

questions.example: Die Kammer hat ___ Gutachten unter Berücksichtigung aller vorliegenden Fakten erstellt.
questions.translation: The chamber prepared its assessment taking into account all available facts.

questions.example: Der Staat hat ___ völkerrechtlichen Verpflichtungen nicht eingehalten.
questions.translation: The state has not fulfilled its obligations under international law.
The delegates resigned from their mandates.

questions.example: Die Partei hat ___ politischen Grundsätze in einem neuen Programm formuliert.
questions.translation: The party formulated its political principles in a new program.

questions.example: Der Rat hat ___ Beschluss mit einer Zwei-Drittel-Mehrheit gefasst.
questions.translation: The council passed its resolution with a two-thirds majority.

questions.example: Die Koalition hat ___ Vorhaben wegen interner Differenzen aufgegeben.
questions.translation: The coalition abandoned its project due to internal differences.

questions.example: Der Präsident hat in ___ Rede die nationalen Interessen betont.
questions.translation: In his speech, the president emphasized the national interests.

questions.example: Die Forscher haben ___ Ergebnisse auf einem internationalen Kongress präsentiert.
questions.translation: The researchers presented their results at an international congress.

questions.example: Die Eltern helfen ___ Kindern bei den Hausaufgaben.
questions.translation: The parents help their children with homework.

questions.example: Du hast ___ Schirm im Bus vergessen.
questions.translation: You forgot your umbrella on the bus.
